Package me.aecsocket.calibre.util.itemuser

Interface GunItemUser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ItemUser
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayerItemUser
    public interface GunItemUser
extends ItemUser
    Represents an ItemUser which can use a gun.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • setSpread

        void setSpread​(double spread)
        Sets and saves the amount of spread on this user.
        Parameters:
        spread - The amount of spread.

      • getSpread

        double getSpread()
        Gets the saved amount of spread on this user.
        Returns:
        The amount of spread.

      • applyRecoil

        void applyRecoil​(me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.util.Vector2 recoil,
                 double recoilSpeed,
                 long recoverAfter,
                 double recoilRecovery,
                 double recoilRecoverySpeed)
        Applies the specified amount of camera recoil to the user.
        Parameters:
        recoil - The amount of recoil.
        recoilSpeed - How fast it takes for recoil to take effect (0.0 - 1.0)
        recoverAfter - The time in milliseconds until recoil recovery can start.
        recoilRecovery - The percentage of how much to move the camera back to its origin after recoil has been applied.
        recoilRecoverySpeed - How fast it takes for recoil to recover once started (0.0 - 1.0)
